Shapes.description: Elements for building Gnome 3 application mockups
Shapes.author: Duong Thanh An

NPatchDomContentFromImage.Arg: var b = collection.toBounds($box, $widgetBounds); new Dimension($box.w + ($box.w - b.w), $box.h + ($box.h - b.h));

Property.name: text
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'text', bound: collection.toBounds($box, $textBounds), font: $textFont, align: $textAlignment, richText: true})

Shortcut.PropertyValue: Lorem ipsum deus phoebe tum, peregrinum mentes diremit austro recessit effervescere.

html:div.style: width: 20px; height: 20px; position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px;
